Class FiLMlayer: applies Feature-wise Linear Modulation to incoming data. It uses metadata, number of channels. Attributes: batch size, height, width, feature size, generator (FiLMgenerator), gammas, betas. Methods: __init__, forward.

So summary: The class implements a FiLM layer that modulates feature maps using learned scaling (gamma) and shifting (beta) parameters conditioned on metadata, producing transformed tensors for downstream neural network processing.

Business intent: Provide a flexible conditioning mechanism for medical imaging models (ivadomed) to incorporate patient or acquisition metadata into convolutional features, enhancing visual reasoning and model performance.

Keywords: FiLM, feature-wise linear modulation, conditioning, metadata, neural network layer, scaling, shifting, image processing, deep learning, medical imaging.
